name: Ghost Invaders
description:
Ghost Invaders

Ghost invaders is a Space Invaders inspired game made for Brackeys Jam 2021.1 . Hope you like the game.

Controls

  • A and D - move Player 1
  • Left and Right Arrow - move Player 2
  • W and UP Arrow - shoot
  • Spacebar - start and restart
  • Escape - go back to main menu
